mapper.select: SELECT A.*, C.CITY_NAME , D.DISTRICT_NAME, F.WASTE_CATEGORY_NAME, G.* , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HEART_TBL WHERE DIV_NO = #{value}) AS heartCount , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHATROOM_TBL WHERE DIV_NO = #{value}) AS chatroomCount FROM DIVIDE_TBL A JOIN CITY_TBL C ON A.CITY_NO = C.CITY_NO JOIN DISTRICT_TBL D ON A.DISTRICT_NO = D.DISTRICT_NO JOIN WASTE_CATEGORY_TBL F ON A.WASTE_CATEGORY_NO = F.WASTE_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN USER_TBL G ON A.USER_NO = G.USER_NO WHERE A.DIV_NO = #{value}

SELECT A.*, B.*, C.*, E.*, F.*, G.USER_NO AS heartUserNo, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HEART_TBL I WHERE I.DIV_NO = A.DIV_NO) AS heartCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHATROOM_TBL J WHERE J.DIV_NO = A.DIV_NO) AS chatroomCount, H.USER_NO AS mUserNo, H.GET_USER_NO, D.IMAGE_PATH AS image_path -- 이미지 경로 가져오기 FROM DIVIDE_TBL A JOIN CITY_TBL B ON A.CITY_NO = B.CITY_NO JOIN DISTRICT_TBL C ON A.DISTRICT_NO = C.DISTRICT_NO JOIN USER_TBL E ON A.USER_NO = E.USER_NO JOIN WASTE_CATEGORY_TBL F ON A.WASTE_CATEGORY_NO = F.WASTE_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DIV_NO, COUNT(*) AS heartCount, USER_NO FROM HEART_TBL WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} GROUP BY DIV_NO, USER_NO ) G ON A.DIV_NO = G.DIV_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DIV_NO, COUNT(*) AS chatroomNo, MIN(USER_NO) AS USER_NO, MIN(GET_USER_NO) AS GET_USER_NO FROM CHATROOM_TBL WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} OR GET_USER_NO = #{userNo} GROUP BY DIV_NO ) H ON A.DIV_NO = H.DIV_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IMAGE_GROUP_NO, MIN(IMAGE_NO) AS min_image_no FROM IMAGE_TBL WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'divide' GROUP BY IMAGE_GROUP_NO ) MinImages ON A.DIV_NO = MinImages.IMAGE_GROUP_NO LEFT JOIN IMAGE_TBL D ON MinImages.min_image_no = D.IMAGE_NO -- 이미지 테이블 조인 WHERE A.IS_DIV_DELETED = 'N' AND A.DIV_NO IN ( SELECT D.IMAGE_GROUP_NO FROM IMAGE_TBL D WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'divide' AND D.IMAGE_NO = MinImages.min_image_no ) ORDER BY DIV_CREATE_DATE DESC
